emails.subject: Network Expansion Plans
emails.body:
Dear Mohammad,

I hope you're doing well. I wanted to discuss potential collaboration opportunities for our upcoming network expansion in the northern region. We believe there are significant growth opportunities we can explore together.

Best regards,
Network Team
Omantel

emails.subject: Re: Network Expansion Plans
emails.body:
Dear Team,

Thank you for the update. I am interested in exploring how we can work together to maximize the benefits of this expansion. Let's set up a time to discuss the details.

Best regards,
Mohammad Al-Awati
Network Operations
Ooredoo
